title: Municipal Sweeper Truck DTMS-4000
description: The DTMS-4000 is a high-performance diesel-operated municipal sweeper truck, designed to tackle large-scale urban and industrial cleaning with unmatched efficiency. Built for demanding environments, it features extra-wide sweeping brushes, a high-power vacuum system, and a precision water spray mechanism for effective dust suppression. Its extra-large debris hopper, long fuel autonomy, and integrated litter picker allow for extended cleaning shifts without interruption.Ideal for municipal roads, expressways, industrial zones, and smart city infrastructure, the DTMS-4000 delivers fast, reliable, and thorough cleaning—making it the perfect choice for municipalities aiming for cleaner, healthier, and more sustainable urban spaces.
keyFeatures: Integrated Litter Picker – Enhanced efficiency along edges and corners of curbs for the easy collection of larger forms of litter such as wrappers and bottles.
Powerful Performance – Best performance in heavy-duty sweeping operations, as it utilizes high torque from the diesel engines.
Long Operating Range – Able to run for several hours continuously without frequent refuels.
High-Capacity Water & Dust Tanks – 400L water and 4000L dust collection for extended operation.
High Suction Capacity – Efficiently lifts dust, gravel, leaves, and plastic litter from roads.
Large Waste Hopper – Less operational pauses bringing increased efficiency by decreasing the need for frequent unloads.
Strong Water Spraying System – Improves cleaning quality by reducing airborne dust while cleaning.
Tough Conditions Are No Problem – Functions properly in any weather or terrain.
Best For City Use – Best suited for major roads, urban roads, and large industrial cities.
